instructions: Connect HTC Desire 12 to the computer using the supplied micro USB cable. On HTC Desire 12 , unlock the screen if it's locked. On the pop-up message that asks whether to use USB for file transfers, tap Yes . If you don't see this message, slide the Notifications panel open, tap the Use USB to notification, and then tap Transfer files . You'll then see options for viewing or importing files on the computer screen. Choose to view files. Copy the files from your computer to HTC Desire 12 , or vice versa. After copying the files, disconnect HTC Desire 12 from the computer.
